function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of privacy in social distancing monitoring may not be acceptable for many individuals","Impact":"Privacy concerns may lead to resistance against implementation of the system","Mitigation":"Provide transparent communication and consent mechanisms for data collection and usage","Technologies":"Privacy-preserving algorithms, encryption techniques","People":"General public, individuals in monitored areas","Owner":"System developers, policy makers"},{"Description":"Potential risk of spreading contagious diseases if social distancing measures are not effectively monitored","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and potential outbreaks","Mitigation":"Strict enforcement of social distancing guidelines, public health awareness campaigns","Technologies":"AI-powered monitoring systems, real-time data analysis tools","People":"General public, individuals in monitored areas","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Dependence on deep learning technology and pre-trained models for medical diagnosis and other critical tasks","Impact":"Reliability and accuracy of diagnosis and decision-making may be compromised","Mitigation":"Regular validation and testing of models, human oversight in critical tasks","Technologies":"Validation frameworks, model interpretability tools","People":"Patients, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Medical institutions, regulatory bodies"}]}
